head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FRIEDMAN, ETHEL R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FRIEDMAN, ETHEL R.

block.p: FRIEDMAN-Ethel R. On May 24, 2000, of Brooklyn, NY, formerly of Belle Harbor, and Kingston, NY. Beloved wife of Morris, devoted mother of Deborah and Richard, loving grandmother of Michal, Yael, Jonathan and Evan, and loving sister of Meyer Blum of Delray FL. Family and friends are invited to a memorial service at Parkside Memorial Chapel, 2576 Flatbush Avenue, Brooklyn NY (Ave V) at 4PM on Tuesday, May 30. In lieu of flowers, donations can be made to either Givat Haviva/Hashomer Hatzair 212-989-9272 or The Jewish National Fund, 1-800-542-TREE.
